TEI.2.document_title: Josiah H Bell to James F Perry, 07-29-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Josiah H. Bell to James F. Perry, July 29, 1834. Introducing Almonte.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1069

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Josiah H. Bell to James F. Perry, July 29, 1834. Introducing Almonte.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr J F Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir Permit ine to interduce to your acquaintance *person_mentioned*Col Almanty [Almonte] */person_mentioned* he will visit your *location_mentioned*neighborhd */location_mentioned*you will find him much of a gentleman and I am sure you will be much Pleased with him *date_mentioned n="07-29-1834">July the 29th 1834*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J H Bell*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
